properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN_STATUS , USER_DIVISION FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO USERINFO ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
INSERT INTO USERINFO ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_DIVISION ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 2 )
INSERT INTO MENTOR ( USER_NO , CLCG_NO , MT_COMPANY , MT_JOB , EMPCARD_PATH , EMPCARD_ORIGINNAME , IDCARD_PATH , IDCARD_ORIGINNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
